Sentence.sentence: Hello Jane.Charles, among other things, you are regarded as one of the America’s great masters of the Blues, a musical idiom that’s essentially about loss, particularly the loss of romantic love.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Charles, among other things, you are regarded as one of the America’s great masters of the Blues, a musical idiom that’s essentially about loss, particularly the loss of romantic love.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In Act One of the show, a yellow cube is lifted from a blue box, and moved across the stage.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: simultaneously, technological advancement and global economy has reduced demand for well- paying blue collar jobs here in the United States.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布卢德语Blau或法语Bleu的英语形式，含义是“蓝的”(blue)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"忧伤的，悲哀的，伤感的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: sad, unhappy, gloomy, blue, sorrowful, melancholy
means: sad ： 最常用词，泛指一切形式的悲伤，着重暂时的不幸或感觉的忧伤。
unhappy ： 多指日常生活中遇到不如意的事而感到不愉快、不幸，侧重指心理状态。
gloomy ： 指愁眉苦脸，令他人也感到扫兴。
blue ： 非正式用词，语气较随便，指较强烈的忧郁或沮丧。
sorrowful ： 多指因丧失亲人等原因所引起的悲哀，也指由于错误而产生的悔恨交加的心情。
melancholy ： 指经常性的忧郁或悲哀，多用于文学描写中。

list.explanation: 极为罕见地，难得有一次

example.en: I do this only once in a blue moon.
example.zh: 此事我只是极为偶然而为之。

example.en: Once in a blue moon I have a little wine with dinner.
example.zh: 我难得有一次在吃午饭时喝一点儿酒。

example.en: He can read like a blue streak.
The dog ran like a blue streak across the lawn.

list.explanation: 消沉，闷闷不乐，愁眉不展，沮丧

example.en: Losing his girl put him into a blue funk for weeks.
example.zh: 他跟他女朋友的亊一吹，使得.他几个星期都闷闷不乐。

list.explanation: 极端神经紧张，极大的恐惧

example.en: He was a a blue funk and ran away.
The men in blue are looking for you.
You can depend on the boys in blue to clean things up in this town.
example.zh: 你可以依靠警察理清本城的情况。

word_mean: 蓝色：光谱的主色之一，天空的颜色
蓝色的：呈晴朗天空色泽的

Sentence.sentence: A home environment in blue can help people reduce food intake.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 题设

Sentence.sentence: After climbing up a hill for a panoramic view of the blue sea, white buildings and green olive trees, I paused to catch my breath and then positioned myself to take the best photo of this panorama.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But it picks up more shades of blue, yellow, and grey than humans do.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: By the end of the century, if not sooner, the world's oceans will be bluer and greener thanks to a warming climate, according to a new study.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: In one study, people who ate meals in a blue room consumed 33 percent less than those in a yellow or red room.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: No, we don't have it in yellow, only in red and blue.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Ocean colour varies from green to blue, depending on the type and concentration of phytoplankton.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: So when it's time to repaint, go blue.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: That first year, I started feeding peanuts to the blue jays, then the squirrels.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The first parking space I found was convenient, but I'd noticed a woman in a blue car circling for a white.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 语法填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The model projects that currently blue areas with little phytoplankton could become even bluer.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: We'd love to explore beale street, the official home of the blues, where we'd listen to live music.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: When we touched down to blue skies and warm air, I sent up a small prayer of gratefulness.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the 2006 film version of The Devil Wears Prada ,Miranda Priestly, played by Meryl Streep, scolds her unattractive assistant for imagining that high fashion doesn’t affect her, Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the assistant’s sweater descended over the years from fashion shows to departments stores and to the bargain bin in which the poor girl doubtless found her garment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Blue, with its intimations of the virgin Mary, constancy and faithfulness, symbolised femininity.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the assistant's sweater descended over the years from fashion shows to department stores and to the bargain bin in which the poor girl doubtless found her garment.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

phrase.cizu_name: do something until (或 till) one is blue in the fac

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)put all one's efforts into doing something to no avail
jx.jx_cn_mean: 累死累活白干一场，忙得脸色发紫

lj.lj_ly: she could talk to him until she was blue in the face, but he was just not hearing.
lj.lj_ls: 她可以和他谈到累死，可他只当没听见。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)难得有一次，极为罕见

lj.lj_ly: I argued with them until I was blue in the face.

jx.jx_en_mean: At a far distance; into the unknown.
From an unexpected or unforeseen source
jx.jx_cn_mean: 出乎意料的：来自没有想到或没有预测的

lj.lj_ly: criticism that came out of the blue.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 突然的，始料不及的：在意料不到的时间里

entry.def: Something that is blue is the colour of the sky on a sunny day.

example.ex: There were swallows in the cloudless blue sky...
example.tran: 燕子在万里无云的蓝天飞翔。

example.ex: She fixed her pale blue eyes on her father's.
example.tran: 她淡蓝色的眼睛紧紧盯着她父亲的双眼。

entry.def: The blues is a type of music which was developed by African American musicians in the southern United States. It is characterized by a slow tempo and a strong rhythm.
entry.tran: 蓝调音乐，布鲁斯音乐（源于美国南部黑人音乐家，节奏缓慢，旋律感强）

example.ex: His singing really does have the depth and the emotional range of the blues.
example.tran: 他的歌声确实颇有布鲁斯音乐的内蕴和情感深度。

entry.def: If you have got the blues, you feel sad and depressed.

example.ex: Interfering in-laws are the prime sources of the blues.
example.tran: 喜欢指手画脚的姻亲最让人头疼。

entry.def: If you are feeling blue, you are feeling sad or depressed, often when there is no particular reason.

example.ex: There's no earthly reason for me to feel so blue.
example.tran: 我也说不出来为什么这么沮丧。

entry.def: A Cambridge blue or an Oxford blue is a man or woman who has played for Cambridge or Oxford University in a particular sport.
entry.tran: （剑桥或牛津大学的）校队运动员，蓝色荣誉者

entry.def: Blue films, stories, or jokes are about sex.

example.ex: ...a secret stash of porn mags and blue movies.
example.tran: 偷偷藏起来的一堆色情杂志和黄色影碟

entry.def: If something happens out of the blue, it happens unexpectedly.

example.ex: One of them wrote to us out of the blue several years later.
example.tran: 数年后他们中的一人突然给我们写了一封信。

means.word_mean: 1. the color of the clear sky in the daytime;
2. blue clothing;
3. any organization or party whose uniforms or badges are blue;

sentences.sentence: "the Union army was a vast blue"

means.word_mean: 4. the sky as viewed during daylight;

sentences.sentence: "he shot an arrow into the blue"

means.word_mean: 5. used to whiten laundry or hair or give it a bluish tinge
6. the sodium salt of amobarbital that is used as a barbiturate; used as a sedative and a hypnotic
7. any of numerous small chiefly blue butterflies of the family Lycaenidae
1. turn blue
1. having a color similar to that of a clear unclouded sky;

sentences.sentence: "October's bright blue weather"- Helen Hunt Jackson

means.word_mean: 2. used to signify the Union forces in the Civil War (who wore blue uniforms);
3. low in spirits;

sentences.sentence: "lonely and blue in a strange city"
"depressed by the loss of his job"
"a dispirited and resigned expression on her face"

means.word_mean: 4. characterized by profanity or cursing;
5. suggestive of sexual impropriety;

sentences.sentence: "he skips asterisks and gives you the gamy details"

means.word_mean: 6. belonging to or characteristic of the nobility or aristocracy;
7. morally rigorous and strict;

sentences.sentence: "she was anything but puritanical in her behavior"

means.word_mean: 8. causing dejection;

sentences.sentence: "the first dismal dispiriting days of November"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French bleu, ultimately of Germanic origin and related to Old English  blǣwen 'blue' and Old Norse blár 'dark blue' (see also blaeberry)
mid 19th cent.: perhaps a variant of blow

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布卢德语Blau或法语Bleu的英语形式，含义是“蓝的”(blue)

sentences.en: You can argue till you're blue in the face, but you won't change my mind.

sentences.en: Join the blue wool onto the end of the gold pattern and work the same stitches into the back.

sentences.cn: 那些白衣服放在一起洗, 这件蓝的要单洗.
sentences.en: Wash the white clothes together, and the blue one separately.

sentences.cn: 那辆蓝色的汽车超过我们的车子.
sentences.en: The blue car overtook ours.

sentences.en: Someone has flown off with my blue bag.

sentences.cn: 在这金制图案边缘织上蓝毛线,在背面也用同样的方法来织.

sentences.en: She wanted to buy the orange dress, but we persuaded her that the blue one was more becoming.

sentences.cn: 普利斯特里解释了其助理的毛衫所采用的深蓝色是如何逐年过时的：从时装展销到百货商店，最后出现在打折区。毫无疑问，这可怜的女孩就是从打折区淘来了这件衣服。

sentences.en: This is an aqua blue again with a dynamic elf.

sentences.en: It may be because the wall was painted blue has become a calm and tranquil colors.

sentences.cn: 我重复了之前的步骤创建了蓝色的同尺寸文字层.
sentences.en: I repeated the previous step again using the same size text and a blue hippy van.

sentences.cn: 蓝色的木棍比黄色的长.
sentences.en: The blue stick is longer than the yellow one.

sentences.cn: 法师的手中射出一大片蓝色的火焰,袭击敌人的队伍.
sentences.en: A shower of blue flames shoots out from the caster's hands andtowards the enemy ranks.

sentences.cn: 四十只蓝色的鳄鱼正骑着黄色的自行车.
sentences.en: Forty blue crocodiles are riding yellow bikes.

sentences.cn: 懒散的白云在淡蓝色的天空飘荡.
sentences.en: Fluffy clouds are scattered across the pale blue sky.

sentences.cn: 我想试穿那件蓝色的毛外衣.
sentences.en: I'd like to try on that blue wool coat.

sentences.cn: 弗兰拿着一个蓝色的文件夹进来了.
sentences.en: Fran came in holding a blue file.

sentences.cn: 以前吉姆总是喜欢她穿蓝色的.
sentences.en: Jim always liked her in blue.

sentences.cn: 玫瑰是红色的, 紫罗兰是蓝色的. 这张母亲卡是特别给您的.
sentences.en: Roses are red, violets are blue. This card on Mother's Day is especially for you.

sentences.cn: 霍尔先生:是只蓝色的小箱子,上面有拉链.
sentences.en: MALL It's a small blue case and it's got a zip.

sentences.cn: 我的头发是金黄色的. 我的眼睛是蓝色的.
sentences.en: My hair is blond. My eyes are blue.

sentences.cn: 那辆蓝色的汽车超过我们的车子.
sentences.en: The blue car overtook ours.

sentences.cn: 今天早上三个学生穿上T恤衫和蓝色的牛仔裤.
sentences.en: This morning three students had on T shirts and blue jeans.

sentences.cn: 蓝色的圆珠笔是我的.
sentences.en: The blue ballpoint pen is mine.

sentences.cn: 在地图上它们都是天蓝色的,而且一样的美丽.
sentences.en: On the map they were both coloured blue and looked pretty much the same.

sentences.cn: 他笑了, 蓝色的眼睛象天空一样澄净,然后又跑走了, 没再回身.
sentences.en: He smiles, sky blue eyes and then he away again, no turning back.

sentences.cn: 她想买那件橙色连衣裙, 但我们使她相信蓝色的更合适.
sentences.en: She wanted to buy the orange dress, but we persuaded her that the blue one was more becoming.

sentences.cn: 比利的自行车弹起了蓝色的大气球.
sentences.en: Big blue balloons bounced by billy's brown bike.

sentences.cn: 威廉姆斯小姐: 我的眼睛是蓝色的, 比利. 但我的鼻子不是红色的.请坐下.
sentences.en: Miss Williams: My eyes are blue, Billy. But my nose isn't red!

sentences.cn: 你有两个罐子, 分别装着50个红色的玻璃球和50个蓝色的玻璃球.
sentences.en: You have two jars, 50 red marbles and 50 blue marbles.

sentences.cn: 大海是深蓝色的.
sentences.en: The sea was deep blue.

sentences.cn: 沮丧的小男孩, 来吹你的号角.
sentences.en: Little boy blue, come blow your horn.

sentences.cn: #14在忧郁的日子里,你会觉得自己在悲伤的海里沉沉浮浮.
sentences.en: On blue days you feel like you're floating in an ocean of sadness.

sentences.cn: 根兹伯罗,托马斯1727-1788英国肖像与风景来画家. 他的代表品,包括忧郁的男孩和丰收马车 ( 都完成于1770年 )
sentences.en: British portrait and landscape painter. His masterpieces include The Blue Boy and The Harvest Wagon ( both c .1770 ).

sentences.cn: 在忧郁的日子里,你可能变成偏执狂,觉得每个人都想要吃定你.
sentences.en: On blue days you can become paranoid that everyone is out to get you.

sentences.cn: 托马斯·斯博罗去世.他是英国风景画和人物肖像画画家, 其代表作有《忧郁的小男孩》.
sentences.en: Thomas Gainsborough , English painter of landscapes and portraits, including The Blue Boy, died.

sentences.cn: 绿袖子的余音在周遭回响,凄凄的, 忧郁的声音, 在诉说一个不幸的故事.
sentences.en: The aftersound of Green Sleeves, telling a miserable story, is ringing around, so melancholy and blue.

sentences.cn: 这是一个非常忧郁的令人悲伤的故事.
sentences.en: It was a rather blue sad story.

sentences.cn: 我们应该学会微笑, 不要让忧郁的心情环绕你及写满了忧伤的表情.
sentences.en: We should learn to smile, never let the blue mood around you and your face.

sentences.cn: 在忧郁的西方全国全国日常表达里,你估计变成偏执狂,觉得每独立个体都想要吃定你.
sentences.en: On blue days you can becoming paranoid those eVery abundance one is out to get you.

sentences.cn: 在忧郁的日子里,你会觉得自己在悲伤的海里沉沉浮浮.
sentences.en: On blue days you feel like youre floating in an ocean of sadness.

sentences.cn: 我希望帖子得到的不是下流的回复.
sentences.en: I hope it isn't just to get a blue response.

sentences.cn: 如果我失去你, 我的生命将变成蓝色的忧郁.
sentences.en: If I lose you, my life will be blue doldrums.

sentences.cn: 水可把无水的硫酸铜 ( II ) 固体由白色变成蓝色.
sentences.en: H 2 O can turn anhydrous copper ( II ) sulphate solid from white to blue.

sentences.cn: 氨气是无色的,它可把湿的红色石蕊试纸变成蓝色.
sentences.en: Ammonia gas NH 3 is colorless which can turn wet red litmus paper to blue.

sentences.cn: 试纸变成蓝色.
sentences.en: The test paper turned blue.

sentences.cn: 而在一个水下的场景中,你会希望变成蓝色.
sentences.en: While in an underwater scene you'll want to go for a blue color.

sentences.cn: 欧洲白种人应该是白色的, 只少暂时还不会变成蓝色人种.
sentences.en: Europe should be a white Caucasian, only temporarily will not become less blue race.

sentences.cn: 直到常青树上的叶子变成蓝色.
sentences.en: Till the leaves turn blue on the evergreen tree.

sentences.cn: 病毒探测器是一种电子装置,当zap病毒 临近时,它会变成蓝色.
sentences.en: A virus detector was an electrical device that turned blue if a ZAP was nearby.

sentences.cn: 在彩虹中, 绿色逐渐变成蓝色, 蓝色逐渐变成紫色.
sentences.en: In the rainbow, the green melts into blue, the blue into violet.

sentences.cn: 有磺存在时,淀粉即呈蓝色.
sentences.en: Starch yields a blue color in the presence of iodine.

sentences.cn: 红外光谱系中, 短波长呈蓝色, 长波长呈红色.
sentences.en: In infrared light, shorter wavelengths look blue, and longer wavelengths appear red.

sentences.cn: 不因实呈蓝色的园林植物有:海州常不水 、 不一不小功绩等.
sentences.en: Fruit blue garden plants radix dichroae fairies, mahoniae, etc.

sentences.cn: 当灭空呈蓝色时;不大可能会下雨.
sentences.en: When the sky is blue , it is improbable that it will rain.

sentences.cn: 结果表明:磷化膜耐蚀性高, 色彩均匀,呈蓝色.
sentences.en: The results show that the phosphating coating is blue, high in corrosion resistance, uniform in color.

sentences.cn: 图示胃粘膜下层广泛纤维化, 三色染色呈蓝色.
sentences.en: Here in the stomach, a stain demonstrates a blue submucosa because of the extensive fibrosis.

sentences.cn: 胞浆和核仁呈蓝色略带紫红色.
sentences.en: Cytoplast and nucleolus were blue with a little purplish red color.

Sentence.sentence: Students mark the main ideas and important details with a pen or pencil, yellow or blue or orange.

Sentence.sentence: For example, maybe you will mark main ideas in yellow, important details in blue and new words in orange
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Would you like to see those pants in brown and navy blue?
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But it's not black and blue or anything.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She is black and blue all over
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: When night falls, red and blue and other colors cast a hazy glow over a city lit up by tens of thousands of neon signs.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When the students came in, sharpened pencils in hand, there was not a blue book in sight.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B
